getSchema(bytes32).details: Returns an existing schema by UID

params.uid: The UID of the schema to retrieve.

register(string,address,bool).details: Submits and reserves a new schema

params.revocable: Whether the schema allows revocations explicitly.

returns._0: The UID of the new schema.
